StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: 15+ years of experience in Technology Development, IT Project/Program/Portfolio/Delivery Management, Service Delivery, Mainframes & SQL Server implementations in Retail, Manufacturing, & Banking domains, Business Analysis, Financial/Cost Management.

PositionHistory.Title: IT Project (Portfolio) Manager
PositionHistory.Description: Feb-2018 Till-Date Bengaluru, IN Portfolio Management Project Management Office Strategic Management Stakeholder Management Agile Scrum Management

PositionHistory.Title: Scrum Master
PositionHistory.Description: Digital Banking - Digital Customer Experience - Oct/2018 to Till-Date • Manage Account Aggregator (UK Open Banking) feature within Mobile Banking 3.0 as Scrum Master - running scrum events, preparing & tracking project schedule, defining & monitoring milestones, grooming backlog, removing blockers for the project delivery • Established & drove the adoption of agile frameworks & tools. Drove the team to follow the Organization established development practices. • Work with Product Manager to understand the Product Vision, Objectives & maintain backlog by drafting the User Epics & Stories using JIRA tool • Team Management of 5-10 Associates (.Net & React-Native Developers, BA & Tester) • Hands-on Tech Management to guide the team through the Technology Landscape & manage the dependencies & risks

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 60% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Publish periodic executive
PositionHistory.Description:
Feb/2018 to Sep/2018 • Manage the investment governance process and operating mechanisms for portfolio demand management, to facilitate planning resourcing requirements and prioritization • Set appropriate goals and priorities that coordinate with key business partners, other organizational units and third party resources • Understand and articulate the value for business in project and portfolio management with the Stakeholders across the Cross Functional team in the Bank • Oversight of project/Task milestones/objectives, risk and mitigation, and the delivery/completion in a matrix structure using Agile Development Methodologies • Manage a budget of $15-20M for IT Small to Medium complex projects & Coordinate yearly investment planning across service owners in the portfolio. • Publish periodic executive Task Management summary status reports
Fidelity Investments Management & Research India (FMR LLC India) - IT Project Manager - Program Management • Led creation of Program Management Office(PMO) for Data Center of Excellence of 120-140 associates spreading across India Locations • Support BU Head & Account Directors with Project Deliverables, Lead generation & follow-ups and Partner-Presentations. • Conduct Project/Engagement reviews regularly; Plan & engage stakeholders/Partners at the regular intervals • Plan & organize the Tech Talks, Trainings & Interactions within the group to encourage the Knowledge sharing • Business Analyst - Machine Learning • Donning the Scrum Master role, performing the below responsibilities: 1. Planned and managed work activities of a software development Team (Web Portal, Customer Onboarding) working closely in conjunction with business teams. 2. Developed and followed and implemented improvements for Agile Project Management Plan (Agile Ceremonies). 3. Monitored Project Progress and radiated the information to Stakeholders. Identified and mitigated Team risks and impediments (Blocking issues, Critical Defects) on daily basis. 4. Coached team members on agile processes and facilitated planning meetings and retrospectives. Maintained Task board, and produced Daily Burndown charts
Wipro Ltd - Lead Consultant/Manager - Program Management • Enterprise Program Management Office (PMO) drives initiatives across Verticals to align it to the delivery across the $2.5+ Billion worth Service Line. • Drive periodic reviews on Existing Accounts - Early warning, Program Governance, CSAT, Escalation Management, People drives, Cost of Delivery (Goal 40%), Automation and Process improvement, People Management. • Drive periodic reviews of New Accounts on their Delivery readiness, Start Green & Stay Green processes, Interlocks discussions with Verticals, People assignment. • Interact with Cross Functional teams - Finance, HR, Competency, Work Force Management Group, Quality, Tools & Automation - to drive through the Operations across the SBU • Provide regular updates to CXOs & participate on the reviews of Service Line's New & Existing Accounts. • Work with Service Line Head to have a clear view of the Account Landscapes, initiate the Org Level initiatives and drive them to close. • Passionate about Program Planning, Customer Engagement to align Delivery with their IT & Business Strategy • Assist Cluster Delivery Heads in reviewing their business, Strategies & cost-of-delivery • Lead a team of 5 to review our Contracts across the Service Line, convert them into trackable actions & coordinate with Account teams to track them periodically.
ANZ Support Services - Senior Analyst Technical & Business Consulting: • Performed Technical Consulting to implement the Mainframe & SQL Server solutions • Assisted Senior Manager in implementing the Global Financial Simplification Strategy across MIS Team by suggesting and implementing the Process Improvements. • Created Documentation for the Processes handled, Handled Transition to Chengdu and from Melbourne, Trained cross teams on Mainframe basics. • Participated as Technical Lead in Multiple Stabilization projects towards Technology Strategy of the Organization. Used it as a platform to reengineer how the current work is done.
Bank of America Continuum Solutions, Analyst Technical & Business Consulting: • Performed Technical Consulting to implement the Mainframe solutions • Performed Production Support & Application Support work. • Performed as a Developer to upgrade the 3rd Party Infor Legacy Systems to the Infor version 9.1.
Satyam Computer Services Ltd - Systems Analyst Technical & Business Consulting: • Performed Technical Consulting to implement the Mainframe solutions • Performed Mainframe Decommissioning, Application Support & Management, & also worked as Onsite Coordinator. • Participated as Technical Lead in Multiple Stabilization projects towards Technology Strategy of the Organization. Used it as a platform to reengineer how the current work is done. • Participated in Requirement gathering, Development and Maintenance of Mainframe Applications & managed the Decommissioning of Mainframe Application, Lead a team of 5 at offshore and had worked as Onsite Coordinator.

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
Harshavardhana M R IT Project Manager | Harsha's LinkedIn Profile harsha.rangashamaiah@gmail.com | +91 8861776600
Summary
15+ years of experience in Technology Development, IT Project/Program/Portfolio/Delivery Management, Service Delivery, Mainframes & SQL Server implementations in Retail, Manufacturing, & Banking domains, Business Analysis, Financial/Cost Management.
Certification: Project Management Professional (PMP #1620069) - Certified Professional Scrum Master -1 (PSM1) - In-Progress to get Certified
Experience Highlights
• Well experienced in Software Project Management, Development, Testing, Production Support, Client & Vendor on-boarding & relationship Management • Has extensive working experience on domains like Banking & Financial Services(7Yrs+), Retail(1.5Yrs+), Manufacturing(2.5Yrs+) domains • Responsible for Project Management & Planning, Time & Cost Management, Customer Management, Quality Management, People Management, Stakeholder & Procurement Management • Well experienced in Agile & Scrum methodologies, Resource Plan, Management Reports creation • Worked in Onsite location in United States as Onsite Coordinator/Systems Analyst for Scoping & SRS, Proposal, Prototype to Customer, Design & Technical document translation from Portuguese to English for Retail Home Office Systems
Education
Institution Degree/Certification From To Location Dr Ambedkar Institute of Technology (Visvesvaraya Technology University - Belgavi) Bachelor of Engineering (Telecommunication Engineering) Oct-1999 Jun-2003 Bengaluru, KA Indian Institute of Management - Indore (IIM-I) MBA/EPGP (Full-Time) Sep-2013 Jun-2014 Indore, MP McCombs School of Business, UT- Austin (International Immersion Program) Advanced Analytics for Business Excellence Jan-2014 Feb-2014 Austin, TX, USA
Technical Skills
Programming Language COBOL, JCL, R-Language, Python Operating Systems MVS, Windows Databases Development DB2, IMS DB, VSAM, SQL Server Project Management tools Jira
Work Experience

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Harshavardhana M R's experience appears to be mostly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Project Management) and slightly concentrated in Finance (mostly Real Estate & Facilities). Harshavardhana M R has 15 years of work experience, with 5 years of management experience, including a somewhat high-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a low-level management role: IT Project (Portfolio) Manager Starting on 2/1/2018, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 21 months: Title: IT Project (Portfolio) Manager for Role/Designation Starting on 2/1/2018, the candidate held the following somewhat high-level management position for 8 months: Title: Publish periodic executive for IT Portfolio Management, Personal & Business Banking Starting on 3/1/2016, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 23 months: Title: IT Project Manager (Program Management) for Fidelity Investments (FMR LLC), FMR LLC Starting on 9/1/2014, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 18 months: Title: Lead Consultant (IT Program Management) for Wipro Technologies

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:311;] The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include the candidate's contact info at the top of the resume.
[Sovren:323;WORK HISTORY] The following section type appeared multiple times in the resume: WORK HISTORY (2 occurrences). Each section type should only appear once in a resume.
[Sovren:231;DEG-2] The following educational degree does not have a degree name: DEG-2. Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.

[Sovren:112;] The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Technical Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education.

[Sovren:151;1] The following section does not have the header on a separate line: 'Certification:'. Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
